body: Can anyone give me the translated version?
@indominusrex She didn't cheat. She was raped. Though it wasn't smart of her to go to the dude's house "alone", and try to break things off. That's where she messed up.

what a weird ending to put her in, especially after she told bf what happened. I don't see whats stopping her from just telling bf what happened again if guy shows bf the video. This is a confusing way to end gfs part and the whole thing.

although the main story left us an open ending which allows the reader to figure on their own. the last two pages somehow feels like Yui's ending should she chose to end the relationship with MC and go back to rapist...  I wonder if the Teacher, Aunt and Land Lady will get one as well...
So she got raped in the end lol it was stupid of her to go back to him. Well that leaves 4 chicks for the MC.

here she wears diffrent clothes and in the last page of the main hentai more like going out clothes...........pretty sure the last page here is before the last page in the main hentai........I mean it looks like is before saying that shes gonna move with him.............i dont know the author is stupid that cant even end something correctly
So.. in the end, the gf still cheats.. pathetic.

@user_A_exist Last page takes place after the end of the main story. She stupidly went back to tell the rapist shithead that things were over between them, shithead gets mad and goes on to rape and blackmail her again.
I mean the last page, she was "raped", which i think she still vaguely enjoy it too, but at the main manga ending, she decided to stay at Yuusuke apartment.
Is this the second ending? Or maybe this happened before ending at the main manga?
